entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mono error after upgrading MudBlazor 7 to 8 #115386
  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests timeout on debug builds #115382
    10.0.0
  • Min*/Max*/Clamp with one or two constant arguments on x86/x64 #115381
  • dotnet watch crash with Aspire and BlazorWASM #115372
    10.0.0
  • XML documentation comments and exception message of MemoryMarshal.Cast are inaccurate #115370
  • .Net 8 json code generator doen't work with Controllers #115377
  • Allow `runtimeconfig.json` override for single file apps #115365
  • [Mobile] Implement CMake export module for CoreCLR on Android and Apple mobile #115362
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: SVE: Rename LoadVector extensions to match the type of the address #115360
  • [9.0] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.AsnEncodedDataTests.TestSubjectAlternativeName_Unix test fails #115359
  • Ping_TimedOut_TAP|Sync_Success fails on MacOS #115358
    10.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests crash on Alpine3.21 x64 #115357
  • `System.IO.EnumerationOptions.MatchCasing` is potentially misleading #115356

Closed

  • Support precompiling fast string -> string switches #115371
    Future
  • Libicu dependency on Debian 13 #115274
  • [API Proposal]: Add AVX10.2 MoveScalar APIs: VMOVD / VMOVW #113090
  • [9.0-staging]: System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.AsnEncodedDataTests.TestSubjectAlternativeName_Unix #115383
  • ReadSlhDsa_Pfx_Ietf_NotSupported: CryptographicException : The specified network password is not correct. #115270
    10.0.0
  • Configuration-binding source generator doesn't bind Dictionary<string, Enum?> #115343
    10.0.0
  • Validating UTF-8 in less than one instruction per byte #43688
  • [wasm coreclr] wrong fields alignment #115363
    Future
  • Need a "web" installer for desktop app bundling #3379
    Future
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing load methods #115243
  • SslStreamCertificateContext.Create can fail on Windows when calling process does not have rights to certificate store #108607
    10.0.0
  • [iOS][globalization][NativeAOT] CultureInfo.CurrentCulture does not include region code #115302
  • Class fields missing in NativeAOT-generated PDBs (not visible in IDA or other debuggers) #115283
  • Performance profiling for WebAssembly #76316
    10.0.0
  • Proposal: Create OOB package for Rune, System.Text.Unicode.Utf8, and related APIs #52947
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Vector Dataype in SqlDbType #115148
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: VectorData.Abstractions #114793
    10.0.0
  • IDirectoryContents doesn't know it's own name or physical path #36496

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch remaining x64 queues to AL3 #115387
    needs-area-label
  • Update branding to 9.0.6 #115385
    Servicing-approved
  • Update branding to 8.0.17 #115384
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0-staging] Link peer's X509 stack handle to parent SSL safe handle #115380
  • [release/8.0-staging] Link peer's X509 stack handle to parent SSL safe handle #115379
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for more libicu versions #115378
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for more libicu versions #115376
    Servicing-consider
  • [WIP] Interpreter to JIT/AOT calls #115375
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • update netcoreapp3.0 to NetCoreAppCurrent in test #115373
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [Apple mobile] Test Native AOT tests build on iOS #115369
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Fix documentation mistakes in MLKem and MLKemAlgorithm #115368
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Replace ATP pattern with async/await in SmtpClient (part 1) #115366
    area-System.Net
  • Remove `_PREFAST_` and `_PREFIX_` #115355
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115354
    area-codeflow
  • [wasm][aot] Optimize OP_WASM_SIMD_SWIZZLE for constant indices #115351
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • Add support for more libicu versions #115374
    area-Setup
  • Add PQC support for SslStreamCertificateContext and fix test #115254
    area-System.Security
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix HttpStress and SslStress missing apphost build error #115352
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Fix config source gen with Dictionary with nullable Enum value #115350
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Replace NET6_0 with NET #115209
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm coreclr] Fix fields alignment #115364
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, Future
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle OSSL 3.4 change to SAN:othername formatting #115367
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [mono][aot] optimize aot Unsafe.BitCast for more cases #115130
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Handle OSSL 3.4 change to SAN:othername formatting #115361
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #114995
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #115008
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.17
  • Swallow CryptographicExceptions when adding certificates to store #115190
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/9.0-staging] [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #114678
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • Haiku: Add native library network support #114523
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, os-haiku, 10.0.0
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with vector #115327
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Updated

  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: revised fix for fp division issue in profile synthesis #115026
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • Make the dotnet/runtime official build an assetless build #115311
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove ymm embedded rounding from AVX10.2 #115235
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Vector128.WithElement codegen regression in .NET 9.0 #115348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2704186 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #114509
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-staging] [STJ] Account for F# CompilationMappingAttribute now supporting multiple declarations. #115076
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.x
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix few RandomAccess.Write edge case bugs #109646
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.6
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #114932
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • Signed CMS for SLH-DSA #115310
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Share allocation helpers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #115339
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][jiterp] Implement i64 jiterp shuffle and simplify logic #115344
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 10.0.0
  • Improve startup perf by avoiding JIT when invoking well-known signatures #115345
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [DRAFT] try enabling regions on Mac again #115251
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Tar: Refine GNU timestamp handling #115211
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Fix constrained call corner cases #111178
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbs #115335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono]: Fix generic interface non-virtual method vt_slot issue in build_imt_slots. #115306
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable stacks on Debugger IPC events #114585
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] try disabling dwarf symbols in the aot output #114805
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Optimize comparisons #115039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm coreclr] Make clr.runtime+libs build on Windows #115058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • HybridCache: add net10 HybridCache zero-alloc fetch API #114427
    api-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    NO-SQUASH, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] runtimeConfig via boot config #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.6
  • Revert change to follow symlinks of dotnet host #115315
    area-Host
